items.sentence: Tom noticed a wedding ring on Mary\'s finger.
I told Tom he should try to do it by himself.
I told Tom that I thought it was a good idea.
Please put some candles on the birthday cake.
I can\'t believe your mom made you wear that.
Tom died just three days after Mary was born.
Tom does everything in such a roundabout way.
Did Tom tell you about what he did last week?
Where were you on the night Tom was murdered?
Who do you think the author of this novel is?
I want this matter taken care of immediately.
I want to emphasize this point in particular.
I want to get as far away from here as I can.
I want to spend the rest of my life with you.
Tom was surprised that Mary had a motorcycle.
Tom wondered if Mary could understand French.
I want to hear all about your trip to Boston.
I want to know why you were absent yesterday.
I want to live comfortably when I become old.
You gave me your word that you would do that.
